title: Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, after you are hanged, you can Torment one player who voted guilty or abstained, dealing an Unstoppable Attack to them. Only usable once per game.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Get yourself hanged by the town.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4440
*Every day, the Jester wakes up with a splitting headache. There's blood pooling under his bed, his arm is severed, and worst of all, he sees someone standing by the doorway, dying and then waking up over and over again. No one believes him, nor should they.*
